alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 8:56PM MST until August 21 at 9:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pima County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 945 PM MST. * At 856 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles north of Ajo to near Kaka, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ajo, Hickiwan, San Simon, Why, Charco 27, Ventana, Gunsight, Vaya Chin and San Simon West. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
